name: Hepburn Method Power Progression (8×2→8×3)
time_per_session_breakdown: 8 sets x ~20s + 2-3 min rest each ≈25 min
overview_and_execution: Choose a ~90% 1RM load for 8×2. Each session, add a rep to one of the sets until all are 8×3. Then increase weight ~5-10 lb and repeat.
example_application: Bench: 8×2@300. Next session: 7×2,1×3@300. Eventually 8×3@300, then move to 310 lb at 8×2.
important_notes: Slow, steady progression. Don’t force reps. Usually combined with lighter accessory (3×6-8) after the heavy work.
volume_metrics: 16 reps at start (8×2) to 24 reps at end (8×3).
